an5.126:1.3: Asappayakari hoti, sappaye mattam na janati, aparinatabhoji ca hoti, dussilo ca, papamitto ca.
an5.126:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma anayussa.
an5.126:2.3: Sappayakari hoti, sappaye mattam janati, parinatabhoji ca hoti, silava ca, kalyanamitto ca.
an5.126:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma ayussa”ti.
